name: JD Minesweeper
description:
This is a clone of the Classic Minesweeper game, the controls are easy. Just touch your screen to move your pointer (mouse cursor) then touch again to click, an long click will flag the current square.

The mission is to clear every square without clicking a Mine or You will lose the game.

There are many themes design (just like your old computer) and there are 3 levels: Easy (with 10 mines), Normal (with 40 mines) and Hard (with 99 mines)

if you need help, please contact us.

Enjoy.
